author: AP
title: Barcelona to sell title rights to Camp Nou to raise money
description: Barcelona will sell the title rights to its storied stadium for one year in an effort to raise money for the fight against the coronavirus
content:
BARCELONA, Spain (AP) — Barcelona will sell the title rights to its storied stadium for one year in an effort to raise money for the fight against the coronavirus.
The Spanish club’s executive board said Tuesday it will donate the entire fee raised by sellin… [+4582 chars]
